website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive gloves that include a lining for warmth while driving or riding on a motorcycle.
pros: Good gloves for whatever kinds of outdoor activities you have planned in cold weather
Interior lining will keep your fingers and hands warm, but it's also really soft
Will fit tightly at the wrist to keep moisture out
cons: Sizes tend to run a little small
Longevity of the materials is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Two (warm and comfortable) thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Immediately comfortable, though tight; like real leather should, each glove stretched as it heated up, and molded itself into the shape of the respective hand it covered, like a second skin. The inside is decadently soft, the outside feels like soft, high quality leather. Still can't believe I got them for such a great price. I don't wear them constantly, so my usage might not subject them to normal wear and tear; with that caveat I must say they are holding up great. I feel like I won them, as some prize in a contest, because they were so amazingly inexpensive. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D Wells-Kent

customer_reviews.title: Warm but...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were ordered for a Halloween event which was held outside. I purchased these because they looked like they would be warm and fit my attire. They seemed nice and warm and smelled of leather. I gave these gloves two stars because within the first 5 minutes of wearing them, the "leather" between the index finger and thumb tore. The tear was about 1.5 inches in length. The tear occurred when I was grabbing a bag from a vehicle. I would have given them one star but they were actually warm and comfortable. A return was not possible as the return period had expired before I actually used them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. My old driving gloves were more for spring and summer. These are both functional and warm. They also appear to be high quality and a good fit - not too snug and difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: NOT Motorcycle gloves.  Tore right away
customer_reviews.text: Never has an Amazon product filled so quickly and so badly for me. First... These are not motorcycle gloves. They are fragile, thin leather gloves for every day use. They should never have been advertised as motorcycle gloves. Second, and this is the “best“ part... They failed the first time I put them on. Split not only at the seam but on the leather itself. Never seen anything like it. They’re simply garbage. Now... They’re cheap and some people have had a good experience. But buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: J Ro***

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected, for the price
customer_reviews.text: I live in SoCal, so warm weather is the standard here, but I travel for work to places it gets very cold. I bought these before my last trip to somewhere forecast to not get above freezing the whole time I was there, and I'm very happy with them. The leather is soft, it didn't interfere with driving or picking things up, and the liner is very warm and kept me comfortable the whole trip. I wish I'd gotten a pair a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: ScottinSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Nice lining and they're very smooth
customer_reviews.text: I'm an xl in gloves and these are right on. Slightly tight in the thumb, but not uncomfortable and they'll stretch. Nice lining and they're very smooth. No funky smell which you can get sometimes with Chinese products. Can"t beat the price for real leather. I planned on using them for winter motorcycling, but they're nice enough to use for dress or casual situations
customer_reviews.author: justjoe

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Soft Leather
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the high quality of these gloves, especially for this low price. The leather is soft and very comfortable. Additionally, the external seams are smooth, the lining is soft & black and the snap closure above wrist is so much nicer than Velcro often used on other gloves. My son got a Large which is a perfect fit ... he measures 9 1/2” from pinky tip to thumb tip when when fingers are at maximum spread. He loves them. Gloves can be dressed up or down.
customer_reviews.author: PegLeo8

customer_reviews.title: How many fingers do I have up?
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to be tight, size 9. (my palm is 8 1/2") I have German hands, wide palm, short fingers. It gives/stretches a bit. Mine fits like a second skin. Good construction.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lemke

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are sized small.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are sized on the small side. I am a decent size guy and I ordered the XL size, which barely fit. A competitors sizing guide had me at more of a large size and certainly not extra large. These are nice gloves they are worth the money feel great, just keep in mind that they are sized on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Swordsman1104

customer_reviews.title: The look wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Not the warmest pair I've had but still very warm. There was a tiny spot that skipped the stitching but barely noticeable. Good gloves. I'll wear them until I lose them and then probably buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Q.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat these gloves! Excellent price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair, they're very good for the value, warm yet thin enough to grip and feel the steering wheel as a good driving glove should. Use it for driving only, they'll last a long time. Shovel show or run a snow thrower, you'll get one winter out of them before tearing. Not a work glove, but a really nice driving glove for an awesome price. Will definitely buy more. AND they smell like fine leather, not a boat bilge...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: What the Doctor Ordered
customer_reviews.text: My doctor has recommended keeping my hands as warm as possible because of increasing arthritis. Thse gloves do the trick. They look great and are very flexible, while keeping my hands warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fuhrmeister

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! I was traveling to Amsterdam in January I think, and bought them. They served me very well in Holland for a week. My good friend whom I was staying with however liked them a lot, so I just gave them to him shortly before I was flying back to the States. I recommend these gloves confidently, they are warm, good material, are well made and the price is definitely not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. The quality, craftsman and thickness for these gloves exceeded my expectations. These are great gloves. Makes me want to buy more as spares. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Big SEANTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Questionable 3M authenticity, borderline quality
customer_reviews.text: The 3M thinsulate authenticity tag pictured on the product page was missing. Product quality is also questionable given that the leather on the finger tips is longer than the inner liner and the left glove fits looser than the right. They are comfortable, but should be cheaper given the quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Gloves!  Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are fabulous! I bought them for motorcycle riding but they are so nice I may use them for dressing up occasions. The leather is very soft and pliable. The fit as an X-large was perfect. Very stylish! And all this for a great price! Think I will order another pair!
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Do not buy them. They were poorly made. The right hand glove split just above the thumb stitching in the leather. They were marked as extra warm, but didn't keep my hands warm. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: John Brian Krembs

customer_reviews.title: Snap wrist closure broke off immediately upon trying the gloves on out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Snap closure broke off immediately upon trying the gloves on out of the box. I am not returning them simply because I only paid $10 for them. To be fair the gloves do fit true to size and the lining does keep my hands warm. Additionally, the leather is genuine and not thin like other inexpensive leather gloves I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Eholla25

customer_reviews.title: A Good looking glove
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking gloves. However think I bought them too small for them to be VERY comfortable. They have sized themselves each time I wear them. As I said they are a very nice looking glove, and even in the bitter weather we've had this winter, they are relatively warm. Will I buy another, I believe so, but I'll buy the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny 0

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I knew what I was purchasing: a cheap pair of lined leather gloves. Would I recommend them? No. Look around. They have a button fastener on back of wrist that does nothing. The pinky finger has way too much material/leather at the end and are stitched slightly crooked. They are in no way form fitting, more of a loose fit glove. I only use them for driving. Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: David LoBiondo

customer_reviews.title: QC is needed by this company.
customer_reviews.text: Let me say this, the fit is perfect, the gloves are incredibly comfortable. My problem with them is that after less than a month of owning the product the right glove has completely fallen apart. The thumb area leather has essentially shredded, and all I do with these is drive and get mail. They aren't even my daily wear, I have, since getting them on the 4th of December, worn them perhaps 15 times.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Joubert

customer_reviews.title: Good for costume not everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: For a costume these work gine, to be worn regularly, dont cheap out and go buy some real gloves. I would put these under “costume” wuality gloves, look like leather but they are not and feel cheap, will tear easily if you are doing activities so best to just use these for a costume accessory. Although thats why i purchased these gloves was for my plague doctor costume so im happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are wonderful. They have a great fit and are very comfortable. Also, they are warm, and made of a soft leather. They are well made and look amazing. My wife gave these to me as a "just because" gift, and I would recommend them to any man! These are substantial gloves, but by no means work gloves. I have good finger motion, and am comfortable driving in them.
customer_reviews.author: BunnyD

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great.
customer_reviews.text: My gloves came fast. The leather and stitching is of excellent quality, and they are lined. They would not keep your hands warm for long in sub-freezing temperatures, however, they are great in most normal cold weather situations down into the mid 30°'s Fahrenheit. They are so nice you could wear them in a fancy environment, or they are affordable enough to wear everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Becker

customer_reviews.title: These have barely been worn and they are already coming ...
customer_reviews.text: These have barely been worn and they are already coming apart at the seems. They are not to small either. Trying to figure out if I can still return them.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Super nice gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for another pair of Isotoner gloves when I found these for less than a third of the price with great reviews. Decided what the heck I will give them a try at this price point and so far could not be happier except for the initial smell is a little bit strong. I’m sure that will wear away once they break in some.
customer_reviews.author: K. Owens

customer_reviews.title: I've had issues with other XL gloves, but these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves arrived just as described. They were very well protected in a thick plastic zip bag made for the gloves and fit inside the packaging envelope. The gloves fit perfectly on both hands, although the snap on the right wrist is slightly off making it a little loose, but still fits well. They are warm and block the wind from going through to your hands, good for taking walks in cold weather or driving in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: But a good buy. I’m certain if I lost a few pounds maybe they would fit better. I have small hands and ordered a medium. They material is better than faux leather or pleather. The inside is lined. Very comfortable. You surely will not be using your touch screen phone but they will keep your hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable, not bulky like most insulated gloves. They were tight at first but since they’re leather they’ve broken in nicely and fit perfectly. Warm to a point, but like every other pair of gloves I’ve ever owned when it gets below 20 you need to put your hands in your pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Soft Black Leather Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves. Nice soft leather. Ordered the large for my son. They're a little big, which I anticipated. They seem to be true to size. Excellent quality. Will last for a long time. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't expect them to be any high quality gloves. They feel cheap and thin. They do fit, but I am only wearing them for a costume on Halloween, and not trying to block snow or cold water. lol I can't use my phone while wearing them, like what is claimed. They aren't uncomfortable, but I wouldn't call them comfortable either.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift. They are soft and feel comfortable. They do run very small. Large should by extra large, etc
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for little money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the gloves a lot. It was little money for good quality gloves. The leather is very soft, as is the lining, and they fit well. My wife wants them too now. Advertised as motorcycle gloves. I think they'd be great for regular wear. I should gloat so much about them or they might jack up the price!
customer_reviews.author: BOP

customer_reviews.title: Warm gloves for the winter
customer_reviews.text: These are good warm gloves for the winter. I would not necessarily say they are true driving gloves but if you are looking to get something that keeps your hands warm this will be it. Nice feel, nice shine to the black. A little stiff but I expect they will break in more with continued use.
customer_reviews.author: John DW

customer_reviews.title: Fingers too long
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking gloves, they seem fairly warm. I gave them 2 stars because as a 'Medium' glove the fingers are way too long. These gloves were not offered in a 'small' that was another negative to this glove. They seem to be well made but time I'll tell as I have only worn them three times.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P. Damiano

customer_reviews.title: They are good looking and fit well
customer_reviews.text: The seams split after only 1 hour of light use. Had to return it. They are good looking and fit well, but mine had weak stitching around the thumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Sized small, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are advertised as motorcycle gloves, they definitely are not! As far as driving gloves, maybe, but they run small and the inside is a very thin flannel, not fleece like as in the picture on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice gloves and very comfortable. Unfortunately it is hard to find gloves for my husband due to his long fingers. I purchased a Large; xLarge was not an option but sometimes when I purchase xLarge the gloves are too big in the palm area. He stated the palm area fits perfect but the length of the finger sections are a little short. The length of his longest fingers are 4"
customer_reviews.author: flowerpowerrkr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for driving in the freezing mornings
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, keep my hands warm and maked it very comfortable for driving early in the morning when my hands usually freeze from touching the steering wheel. love it and I look forward now for my early morning trips
customer_reviews.author: nockielove

customer_reviews.title: Supple, Warm, and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Only had these for a day, but they feel warm, soft, and don't interfere with using my hands. They don't work with my Galaxy S7 Edge touchscreen, but neither do they claim to be touch compatible, so I'm satisfied with that. I have a Cross pen/stylus anyway, and the gloves are supple enough to let me use that.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, comfortable and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Perfect fit and keep my hands perfectly warm. Seem durable. I have used them picking up limbs that fall and no problem. Gotten them very dirty and they cleaned right up with water and a sponge! I will buy more when I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was intending on only using these for a Halloween costume but now i will use them for almost any occasion in the cold. Great genuine leather gloves for the price tag. I absolutely love these, thank you for the great pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy inside leather outside
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed at these prices for the quality of the product. These are great. My husband has a expensive pair and it’s not near the warmth and quality as these. I will be ordering a couple more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: play4ever

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT gloves at a ridiculously low price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves! The fit is perfect, the materials are excellent - great leather, 3M Thinsulate lining. They look very sharp and are very comfortable. Buy with confidence and don't spend any more money - there's no need. Spending more money won't get you a better glove.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: i love em they fit really good nice soft leather that ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got these gloves ,i love em they fit really good nice soft leather that looks nice ,the lining is not to thick just right for driving gloves that keeps the chill out, they are a fantastic buy for the price ,i would buy again without a doubt, i did not use these on a motorcycle so i can,t say how they would be for that ,but driving a car awsome
customer_reviews.author: American zeekzilla

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, warm, and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are nice lined leather driving gloves. I really like the soft sheep skin interior and the button fastener, it is way easier to put on and take off with the button. I have had them for a few days and they seems to be durable and well made. I'm planning on using them for driving and not for anything strenuous like shoveling snow. I'll update if I notice any strains or tears. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RuthJ180

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think the lining was particularly nice. And even the size I bought (I think it was XL?) felt snug in terms of dexterity. However, my main complaint is that after just two weeks of very light use, a major seam tore open. I mean, I’m talking putting them on once a day for maybe a few minutes at a time. I’d say they were workmanlike and got the job done if not for that. You get what you pay for, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Deschain

customer_reviews.title: itchy for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Friend says the liner smells a bit funny and makes his hands itch. He has sensitive skin but I cannot figure why they'd make him itchy. Weird. Perhaps an odd chemical? The leather seems good and they arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run very, very small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size extra-large, and the packaging said "extra large," but the gloves themselves were no larger than extra small. Perhaps the product description should have indicated that they were made in children's sizes. At least I cannot be convicted of murder, because "if the gloves don't fit, you must acquit."
customer_reviews.author: D. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality--super soft leather. They fit as expected. I suppose if there is any doubt about size, order up, but my mediums fit my husband perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Burton, OH

customer_reviews.title: my pair was well made.
customer_reviews.text: mine were well made and I use daily without issues. I went by the size chart and the pair I got seemed to run a little large. I kept them, since my son who has larger hands can wear them too. they look snug and cool on him and too loose on me. be careful with the size. they don't work on touch screens,... keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in workmanship and design.
customer_reviews.text: Leather gloves were sewn from many small pieces. The seams across the palms make them uncomfortable to use driving. I can’t imagine riding any distance on a motorcycle wearing these. They are OK for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: lawdog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my son. He loved them, they are soft and the quality is pretty good. They looked and felt like I paid way more for than I did.
customer_reviews.author: MeIGot2B

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather gloves
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought these is because I bought a nice leather jacket. But I am shocked how well they fit and how warm they are. It's lining is so soft. We are turn into spring in NW Ohio now so i won't get to wear them that much longer but when fall and winter hit I will be so ready.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves when I ride my motorcycle. They are very comfortable, not at all bulky and keep my hands warm. One of the best gloves I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Brunet Jr

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. I almost ordered large according to the size chart but went ahead and ordered XL and am glad I did. Large would have been to small.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Walker

customer_reviews.title: A quality looking glove ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and supple with nice stitching. Feel nice on the hands. Measured my hand as recommended (8.5"), ordered a medium and they fit perfect. Hope they will hold up to just normal usage ... ain't ganna make and throw any snowball with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ray of Slinger WI

customer_reviews.title: I like them but the first day I wore them the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them but the first day I wore them the left one tore between the index finger and little finger had to send them back and order another pair. Hopefully the next pair dis fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: much better than the price suggests
customer_reviews.text: I bought me a pair and enjoys them so much that i bought all 5 of my boys a pair for christmas. I wore mine on a 5000 mile motorcycle trip, some wet weather along the way and they performed very well. I'm guessing they wouldn't keep your hands warm in winter conditions but did a good in fall weather. I'd certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Heil

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son-in-law and he loved them. He said they fit perfectly and they are so warm and comfortable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how these gloves are made. I ride my electric mobility scooter the VA allotted me and these are perfect for the long ride in the cold temps. They seem to be getting a better fit as I wear them longer. The stitching on them is pretty darn good too. Yeah,I'd buy them again. Thank you for the fast delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snug
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pair. One med and one large. They loved them. So soft and snug. Fit them great. Both were gonna use as driving gloves even both owning motorcycles. Seemed to be true to size.
customer_reviews.author: EastOreMom

customer_reviews.title: "Large"?  I think not
customer_reviews.text: Got large size and they were way too small, so I ordered X-Large.. and the replacements were the exact same size. This does not seem like "genuine leather" either. Sending both pairs back.
customer_reviews.author: JoeB

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice looks good at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit perfectly and for the money they are perfect. I wouldn't stay out in the cold for hours in them but going to the car and doing some shopping they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Loren Mckheen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and was put to a test recently
customer_reviews.text: Knew they'd be useful but didn't know how much until last week when it hit 8 degrees. I was wearing 2 hoodies over a long sleeve shirt and was still shaking, but my hands were nice and toasty. Need a coat as warm as these gloves. Very recommended
customer_reviews.author: Clayt

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUAILTY HOLE BETWEEN THUMB AND FINGER WHEN OPENED.
customer_reviews.text: They were just delivered today and there is a gap in the leather on the left glove between the thumb and index finger. The right glove does not have this issue. Some “Fine Quality” indeed.
customer_reviews.author: JShu

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves for winter in the northeast. However, they have only lasted about a year for each pair, though I do not treat them like 'kid gloves', sometimes doing yard work and such wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk! The left glove tore open as I put it on!!! They were the right size but made so cheap the leather tore not the stitching on the very first use!
customer_reviews.author: Das Tom

customer_reviews.title: Chinese XL???
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves at a fair price. I ordered x-l since I am 6 feet plus with large hands (I easilly "palm" a basketball. The gloves are a bit tight and i am afraid they will eventually fall apart. The lining is also quite thin, so more for driving than keeping warm.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Posner

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloves, they are warm and confy and make you look classy thats a plus even that I dont have a large hand the L fit perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: treat them well, and they are nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable, but not warm enough for more than 30 or so minutes under 40 degrees. They look nice, and are great for dressing up, however they did not hold up to a day at the gun range in the snow, and fell apart the next day skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Awesomesauce

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Tear in finger upon arrival. Not even worth sending back. Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyelynn

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather but sizing is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Leather is soft and pliable but the lining looks cheap, time will tell. I ordered XL glove and it is very tight and more like a large so I would tell to order a size larger then you need. I am hoping they stretch with use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Dwello

customer_reviews.title: Ripped first time worn
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. We started with a large and returned for an XL. He wore them once and they ripped. He said they felt good, but the quality is pretty low if pulling them on the first time (beyond trying them on) leads to a huge rip where the glove meets the cuff.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Might be worth a second chance
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor quality put on and made a fist and tore out instantly on rite hand the left hand was good seemed to nice and warm. May have just got a bad one but quality inspection should have noticed
customer_reviews.author: brian malone

customer_reviews.title: love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: i got these gloves for my dad and he loves them they keep his hands warm over all a good pair of gloves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hands, Happy Man! Amazing Leather Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these awesome gloves for the hubby and he's so pleased with them...finally something he likes! He wears x-large and fit him like a glove (no pun). We live in Michigan and as many may know, Winters can be a little rough. They're definitely well-made, stylish and keep his hands warm. The price is excellent and well worth ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Letty Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Fake looking " leather "..
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for...leather looks fake. Finger length long enough, glove tight to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I purchased them to wear while driving and they are great. The leather is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, was a gift for someone else, I was jealous, but the packaging could have been better
customer_reviews.author: pat freeman

customer_reviews.title: fit is perfect..
customer_reviews.text: fit is perfect... have had any real cold weather yet to give a real good breaking in but I am sure they will be just fine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M

customer_reviews.title: Nice but super smelly!
customer_reviews.text: Good style. Comfortable and fits well. My only complaint is the “leather” smell is incredibly strong, almost nauseating. Hoping the smell fades with time and use.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves at a great price ($11 when I got them) I got mediums which I usually wear and the fit is excellent! Very comfortable, warm, and nice looking. Highly recommended!!

customer_reviews.text: The gloves really look nice. I had two problems with them. First, the lining was not effective in keeping my hands warm, even in 40F weather; my hands got cold right away.
